Text: I remember only one scene from this movie because it came on the new cable "On Tv" It was some weird sex scene with the people squirming on the floor. I only remember this because even as a young child I was embarrassed by that and asked my granddad "what is THAT?" and He answered "Ghost Story" I then said "what kinda ghost story is that!?

Thanks for this classic Jerry!

Prev comment is even funnier when you look at the username.
